Class RequestFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mobilab.accountservice.bussiness.message.RequestFactory

  • public class RequestFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    a Factory class to create any type of request in gate

      static MyRequest create(long id, java.lang.Long gateID, java.lang.String sender, Account account)

      creates an update account message request.

                                 java.lang.Long gateID,

                                 double amount,
                                 java.lang.String accountNo2,
                                 java.lang.Double balance)
        creates a transfer message request.
        Parameters:
        accountNo - - source account number
        amount - - amount of money to transfer
        accountNo2 - - destination account number
        balance - - source account balance (is null when gate creates it)
